snippet.title: Band Stars - Debut Trailer
snippet.description:
Click to Subscribe: http://bit.ly/HalfbrickYTSubscribe

OUT NOW IN AUSTRALIA AND CANADA. GLOBAL RELEASE COMING DECEMBER 5TH! http://bit.ly/bandstars

The debut game from Six Foot Kid! Produly presented by Halfbrick, the Australian creators of Fruit Ninja and Jetpack Joyride!

Form a band, hit the studio and start recording. Band Stars is all about the music!

Set your sights on world stardom and make your way to the top of the local, national and global charts. Discover each of the 50 super-cool Band Stars characters and complete over 200 unique challenges

Band Stars will be released as a free download later in the year, with Australian and Canadian users able to download the game right now on the App Store.

Stay tuned for more details soon!

EARLY ACCESS (AU & CA ONLY):
http://bit.ly/bandstars

LIKE US ON FACEBOOK:
http://facebook.com/bandstarsgame
